name: Duel For What
description:
Who washes dishes tonight ? Who's gonna buy a drink for other ? Let's have a duel game to find out. :D

This game is my second game made and published.It have 5 unique playmode games currently.

Features:

Duel for what:
Pick 1 special request and duel a game with your friend
Winning the game means you can get the sp request from your friend ( or vice versa )

You may also practice with ai player :)

5 unique game(there will be more in the future~)

Dog fight:
Shrump-like game which add some rogue-like factor.
Dodge ball:
Who's the quickest in action while also the best shooter?
Rune memory:
Before the god of old world,the winner get the most of rune stone.
Build & Blast:
Build your own unique catapult to destroy your opponents
Music Battle:
An intense rhythm game, enjoy the music!
